amendatorysection.para: Egg handler shall mean any person who engages in any business in commerce which involves buying or selling any shell eggs or processing any shell egg products and who is not a producer with production from a flock of three thousand hens or less. Egg handler shall include persons who assemble, collect, break, process, grade, package, or wholesale shell eggs. The term does not include a person whose primary food-related business activity is not egg handling.
